member.name: T:Smi.Encryption.CommandLine.CredCommand
member.summary: A command to generate API Key and secret

member.name: M:Smi.Encryption.CommandLine.CredCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Smi.Encryption.CommandLine.CredCommand.ExecuteCommand
member.summary: Creates a set of API Key and Secret on each call.
member.returns: Return 0 is everything was right, an negative error code otherwise.

member.name: M:Smi.Encryption.CommandLine.CredCommand.GetSqlTemplate
member.summary: Gets the SQL template from the configured template file.
member.remarks: location of template file comes from app.config appSettings key command.templateFileName If this key is not found, we default to a file called ApiCredentialInsert.sql placed in the running directory of the exe

member.name: T:Smi.Encryption.CommandLine.CryptoCommand
member.summary: Represents a command that can perform encryption and decryption

member.name: P:Smi.Encryption.CommandLine.CryptoCommand.Option
member.summary: Gets or sets the option that determines the operation to perform.

member.name: M:Smi.Encryption.CommandLine.CryptoCommand.ExecuteCommand
member.returns: Return 0 is everything was right, an negative error code otherwise.
